name: @srnd/topocons
description: SRND icons and emoji for React projects.

scripts.clean: rm -rf stage1/Icon stage1/Emoji dist/Icon dist/Emoji dist/index.js; mkdir dist/Emoji; mkdir dist/Icon;
scripts.build:icons: rm -rf stage1/Icon dist/Icon; svgr src/Icon -d stage1/Icon; create-index stage1/Icon; babel stage1/Icon -d dist/Icon
scripts.build:emoji: rm -rf stage1/Emoji dist/Emoji; svgr src/Emoji -d stage1/Emoji; create-index stage1/Emoji -r; create-index stage1/Emoji; babel stage1/Emoji -d dist/Emoji
scripts.build:index: rm dist/index.js; create-index dist; babel dist/index.js -o dist/index.js
scripts.build: "$npm_execpath" run build:icons; "$npm_execpath" run build:emoji; "$npm_execpath" run build:index

author: Tyler Menezes
